text:
[Verse]
Dancing through the night
Under neon light
Chasing dreams we know
Rhythm takes control

[Verse 2]
Stars above so bright
In the city height
Lost in endless fun
Till the morning comes

[Chorus]
Midnight star shining far
Guiding me through the dark
In your glow I find my spark
You’re my midnight star

[Bridge]
Whispers in the air
Magic everywhere
Feel the pulse inside
On this midnight ride

[Verse 3]
Echoes in the street
Where our shadows meet
In this sleepless town
We won't come down

[Chorus]
Midnight star shining far
Guiding me through the dark
In your glow I find my spark
You’re my midnight star
title: Midnight Star
